Spiritual

A standard spiritual beat. Written to work in the 120 to 180 bpm range.

  • Spiritual
  • SpiritualPlus
  • SpiritualSus
  • SpiritualSusPlus
  • SpiritualIntro

  • SpiritualEnd

Spiritual

A basic spiritual beat in 4. (4)
Chord Piano1
Drum SnareDrum1
Drum-Clap HandClap
Drum-Hh ClosedHiHat
Walk AcousticBass

SpiritualPlus

Add in a jazz guitar plucking notes. (4)
Arpeggio Organ1
Chord Piano1
Drum SnareDrum1
Drum-Clap HandClap
Drum-Hh ClosedHiHat
Walk AcousticBass
